description: Doctors certifying that women or girls are virgins could face jail and fines.
title: France plans punishment for 'virginity tests'
title_page: France plans punishment for 'virginity tests' - BBC News
maintext: Gynaecologist Dr Ghada Hatem told France Inter news that "in France this doesn't affect thousands of women - I am asked by about three women maximum [for certificates] each year". Often it is girls from the Maghreb - Muslim-majority north-west Africa - who ask for them, she said.
